item.title: Roblox: Specter Codes (September 2025)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • All Specter Codes
  • How to Redeem Specter Codes
  • How to Get New Specter Codes

Specter is a unique Roblox experience that allows you to become a professional ghost hunter. There, you will need to use various devices to detect different paranormal activities. Once you find all the clues, you will be able to guess the type of ghost you are dealing with. The game features special coupons that you can redeem for bonus rewards, and here we will tell you about these Specter codes.

Updated September 7, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: A fresh reward has just been added, giving you a mix of Vault Tokens and Splash Collection items. Alongside this, other active codes continue to provide outfits, skins, cash, and cases, making it easy to pick up different types of bonuses. Since these rewards don’t stay around forever, it’s smart to claim them while you can. More updates may bring even more variety, so checking back later is always worthwhile.

All Specter Codes

Working Specter Codes

  • LABORDAY25 – Gives you 3 Vault Tokens and 2 Splash Collection. (NEW)
  • ESCAPED – Gives you a Case.
  • JUNE2025 – Gives you skin.
  • AMENITIES – Gives you a Case.
  • FLORAL05 – Gives you skin.
  • EASTER2025 – Gives you Exclusive Outfit and 5 Vault Tokens.
  • 4SYLUM – Gives you Exclusive Outfit and 5 Vault Tokens.
  • WEEKTHR33 – Gives you the Legendary Star outfit for Lawson and Сash.
  • WEEKTWO – Gives you the Сash.
  • 500M – Gives you the 50k Сash.

Expired Specter Codes

  • CLASSICEMF
  • MARCHREVERT
  • BUGGYMARCH

Codes in Specter can provide you with various cosmetic items, such as skins for your Equipment. These cosmetics will help you make your character unique and stand out from other players. Of course, you can purchase some of these items from the shop, but promo codes are also a good way to obtain them.

Unfortunately, coupons in this Roblox game may expire in the future, and we don’t recommend you wait too long before redeeming them. If you don't activate promo codes in time, they will most likely become unavailable, resulting in the loss of all your free rewards.

How to Redeem Specter Codes

The rewards you can get for redeeming Specter codes are nice, but you can’t get them right away. In order to unlock the redemption feature, you will have to play the game for a while. Here is a list of steps you need to follow to activate Specter codes and claim your special bonuses:

  • Launch Specter and wait for the game to load.
  • After that, learn the basics of this Roblox experience and play for 1+ hours. This is necessary to unlock the redemption menu.
  • Once you have access to the redemption menu, open the Home tab in the main menu.
  • Look at the upper right corner of the screen. There, you will need to find the Codes button and click on it.
  • Type the code you want to use in the menu that pops up.
  • Click on the Redeem button.
  • The reward is yours.

How to Get New Specter Codes

The developers may add new Roblox codes in the future, and we will update this article if this happens. Feel free to bookmark our guide and use it as a source of information on rewards you can get for free. Also, you could follow the official media related to Specter :

  • X Account
  • Discord Server
  • Roblox Group

How to Redeem Codes in Da Hood

When it comes to redeeming codes in Da Hood , players just need to follow a few quick steps:

  1. Launch Da Hood
  2. Click on the Treasure Chest button on the bottom left of the screen
  3. Click inside the Enter Code Here box and paste the code
  4. Click Redeem to complete the process

Da Hood Tips and Tricks

To have a good time in the game, players need to have Da Hood Cash. To get Da Hood Cash, they can visit various stores, some of which will pay them for collecting shoes. Alternatively, players can use the above codes, which will provide them with a large amount of Da Hood Cash. In order to avoid feeling sad from the constant harassment of other gamers, players need to find and buy weapons, ammunition, and armor, which can be found in certain stores.

Best Roblox Shooter Games Like Da Hood

Although Da Hood is a fun game, there may come a time when it becomes boring. Often, in such cases, players look for alternatives. And to make it all easier for them, below is a list of the best games like Da Hood :

  • Ohio
  • Arsenal
  • East Brickton
  • Combat Warriors
  • Military Tycoon

About the Da Hood Developers

Da Hood developers are pretty productive, and their Da Hood Entertainment group has over 1 million members. They are also very active on their Discord server, where users can find many exciting things.

item.title: Roblox: Own a Fish Pond Codes (September 2025)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • All Own a Fish Pond Codes
  • How to Redeem Codes in Own a Fish Pond
  • How to Get More Own a Fish Pond Codes

Own a Fish Pond is a simple but exciting Roblox game where, as the name suggests, you breed fish. Basically, the gameplay consists of growing fish eggs, strange as it may sound. When the fish mature, you can sell them to buy better gear and new species of fish. The routine is also spiced up with various quests that add excitement to the process.

However, fish grow quite slowly, and beginners may find it a bit boring during this time, so the developers decided to give players the opportunity to get cool rewards for free in just a few clicks. All you need to do is redeem the Own a Fish Pond codes from this guide.

Updated September 7, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: A brand new reward has just been added, giving you the chance to claim an Ink Bucket. It’s a simple bonus that can be useful if you’re looking to expand what you already have. Be sure to grab it while it’s still active. More freebies may arrive in the future, so checking back here often can help you stay up to date.

All Own a Fish Pond Codes

Working Own a Fish Pond Codes

  • KRAKENLING - Redeem this code to get Ink Bucket. (NEW)

Expired Own a Fish Pond Codes

  • BLOOPBLOOPBLOOP - Redeem this code to get DeepSea and Axolotl.
  • ECHOINGDEEP - Redeem this code to get free rewards.
  • FISHINGFIXED - Redeem this code to get free rewards.
  • SUMMEREND - Redeem this code to get free rewards.
  • BUGSQUATCH - Redeem this code to get free rewards.
  • WELOVEPOND - Redeem this code to get free rewards.
  • SUMMERSEASON - Redeem this code to get free rewards.
  • AXOPARTY - Redeem this code to get free rewards.
  • DEEPSEA - Redeem this code to get 1 Deep Sea Bucket and $10,000.

Codes in Own a Fish Pond will be useful for both beginners and experienced players, as they can bring rare eggs and money. This will help you quickly develop your farm, buy better gear, and grow bigger fish.

How to Redeem Codes in Own a Fish Pond

Codes in many Roblox games are easy to redeem, as developers often leave this option right in the game interface. The same is true for Own a Fish Pond , but the “Codes” button is hidden in the corner of the screen, so it's hard to spot at first. If you're confused and need help, don't worry, we've provided instructions explaining how to redeem codes in Own a Fish Pond :

  • Launch Roblox and open Own a Fish Pond .
  • Look at the upper left corner of the screen. Click the Codes button.
  • In the new window, paste the code from our list of working codes into the text field and click the green Claim button.

Remember that if the code expires, you will not be able to redeem it and receive rewards. Therefore, we recommend that you do it as soon as possible.

How to Get More Own a Fish Pond Codes

We regularly update this guide, so we recommend bookmarking it in your browser to get all the latest Roblox codes. In addition, you can visit the Own a Fish Pond developer's web resources:

  • Own a Fish Pond Roblox game page
  • Own a Fish Pond Roblox group
  • Own a Fish Pond Discord server
  • Own a Fish Pond X page

item.description:
Quick Links

  • How to Use Blue Lock Rivals Sound IDs
  • How to Get More Blue Lock Rivals Sound ID Codes

Blue Lock Rivals is a soccer game on Roblox with a huge active user base. This is not surprising, as the developers are constantly working to improve gameplay and add new content.

One of the game's great features is the ability to add custom sounds for goals and other actions. If you want to diversify the gameplay, you should use the Blue Lock Rivals sound ID codes from our guide.

Updated September 7, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: A couple of new sounds have been added, giving you fresh audio to enjoy. These new additions complement the existing variety of sound options already available. You can explore them alongside other familiar clips for different experiences. More sounds may be added in future updates, so it’s a good idea to check back regularly for new audio rewards.

How to Use Blue Lock Rivals Sound IDs

Sound IDs in Blue Lock Rivals are straightforward to use, but there is one inconvenient detail that may be concerning for many players. To apply custom sounds, you must purchase a game pass for 109 Robux. However, this is a small price to pay, so it's worth buying if you're a fan of this Roblox game. To help you, we've created a step-by-step guide explaining how to redeem codes in Blue Lock Rivals .

  • Launch Roblox and open Blue Lock Rivals .
  • Look at the bottom of the screen with a bunch of buttons. You need to click on the rightmost button, Settings.
  • Next, you will see three text fields. Enter the code in one of them, depending on your preference. Then click Set.
  • If you don't have a game pass yet, buy it. After that, you will be able to use different sound IDs during the game.

How to Get More Blue Lock Rivals Sound ID Codes

Blue Lock Rivals Sound ID codes can be found all over the internet, for example, on TikTok or in guides like this one. We cannot recommend a specific source for the sounds as there are so many of them, so we recommend bookmarking this page in your browser, as we will be updating it with new cool sounds from time to time.

item.title: Best Horror Games That Became Viral Sensations
item.description:
The horror genre is something both AAA and indie developers can tackle, using a wealth of different ideas to ensure that their scary experiences stand out. Some games in the genre are so fortunate that they end up going mega-viral upon launch.

This rampant success encourages developers to form sequels or try out unique spins on their established gameplay loops. Either way, no one can argue that these horror games didn't deserve to go viral, especially after players experience the quality these titles bring to the table firsthand.

Five Nights at Freddy's

A Jump Scare Fest That Spawned One of the Most Popular Horror Franchises Around

Five Nights at Freddy's
9.0 /10
Released
August 8, 2014

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL

Developer(s)
Scott Cawthon
Publisher(s)
Scott Cawthon, Clickteam LLC USA
Platform(s)
Android, iOS, PC, PS4, Switch, Xbox One
OpenCritic Rating
Strong
Powered by

One of the most popular horror games ever made that spawned a legendary franchise, Five Nights at Freddy's captured the attention of fans all over the world with its focus on jump scares and simple button presses. It enjoyed a boom during the Let's Play era and has ridden this wave of success ever since.

The gameplay loop was simple enough for players to wrap their heads around, powering through the game's jump scares to enjoy a fun horror title. While the quality of subsequent games is up for debate, there's no denying that Five Nights at Freddy's used its branching lore to capitalize on the title's virality and helped fans enjoy a genuinely compelling backstory to these nightmarish animatronics.

Slender: The Eight Pages

A Stalking Horror Game That Became All the Rage in the Let's Play Era

Slender: The Eight Pages
6.5 /10
Released
June 26, 2012

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL

Developer(s)
Parsec Productions
Publisher(s)
Parsec Productions
Platform(s)
PC
Powered by

During the time when games with a ton of jump scares were blowing up on Let's Play channels, Slender: The Eight Pages became one of the most popular video games fans could check out in the horror genre. What seemed like a simple objective to grab all eight pages in a desolate forest became complicated as the Slenderman started stalking players.

It's a simple premise that turned Slenderman into one of the most popular modern horror legends. Even now, players can boot up this game and enjoy a nostalgic experience back in a time when YouTube gamers were blowing up... that is, until the haunting Slenderman appears and scares them out of their wits.

Phasmophobia

A Co-op Horror Game That Showed Everyone How This Unlikely Combination Can Work

Phasmophobia
9.3 /10
Released
October 29, 2024

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL

Developer(s)
Kinetic Games
Publisher(s)
Kinetic Games
Platform(s)
PC, PlayStation 5, Xbox Series X, Xbox Series S
OpenCritic Rating
Strong
Powered by

Co-op and horror don't seem like genres that can mix too well, which is why Phasmophobia was such an important title. It showed how friends could have fun roleplaying as ghost hunters, using proximity voice chat to interact with others.

Each ghost in the game needed to be identified before players could figure out how to exorcise these spirits. It made for a great time as players tried not to be split apart from their friends and screamed in unison when a ghost started chasing them.

Amnesia: The Dark Descent

A Horror Game With Immersive Sim Elements That Blew Up On YouTube

Amnesia: The Dark Descent
9.5 /10
Released
September 8, 2010

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL

Developer(s)
Frictional Games
Publisher(s)
Frictional Games
Platform(s)
PlayStation 4, Nintendo Switch, Android, Xbox One, Microsoft Windows, macOS
Powered by

Frictional Games had done a great job of combining immersive sim elements with horror gameplay in their Penumbra titles, but the dawn of the Amnesia series is when their games truly became mainstream. The Dark Descent became a favorite of horror Let's Plays as players uncovered a chilling story while trying to survive in a scary mansion full of nightmarish experiments.

Unlike most other horror games that became prominent around the same time, Amnesia: The Dark Descent is a genuinely great game that weaves a terrifying atmosphere to scare players out of their wits. It's an approach that worked so well that Frictional Games didn't change the formula too much with its sequels before eventually switching things up (for the better) with The Bunker .

Alan Wake 2

Everyone Put Some Respect On Remedy's Name After This Title's Quirkiness Resonated With Them

Remedy Entertainment has made some of the most stylish, story-driven action games that fans can check out. While most of their games are popular in their own right, Alan Wake 2 reached a level of popularity and success that this title deserved.

The game's bizarre sequences and the exploration of the Remedyverse ensured that this game became a major talking point after it came out. The dance number, in particular, lit the internet on fire with just how bizarre it was. The surreal tones, combined with the game's unique horror (and humor), created an unforgettable survival horror experience.

Alien: Isolation

Came Out of Nowhere to Become the Best Video Game to Use the Alien IP

No one expected Alien: Isolation to be anything more than a decent use of the IP. So, when this immersive horror game shattered all expectations and let fans enjoy some of the most advanced pursuer AI seen in a video game, it's easy to see why fans couldn't stop raving about this title.

The numerous ways Amanda can meet a grisly end made for an easy way for the game to go viral, but it's the scintillating gameplay and tense exploration that helped Alien: Isolation stand out as one of the best horror games ever made.

Inside

A Side-Scrolling Horror Extravaganza That's in a Class of Its Own

After their modest success with Limbo , Playdead decided to go all out with the release of Inside . This atmospheric side-scrolling puzzle game with horror elements became a gaming sensation, with players loving its immersive storytelling and simple yet engaging gameplay.

A bombastic ending that left players with more questions than answers cemented this eerie game as one of the best indie horror games players can enjoy. The cryptic storytelling ensured that passionate fans would discuss this title at length, which only made outsiders even more curious about what it had in store, helping Inside reach a far broader audience than Limbo ever could.

P.T.

Kojima's Taser Demo Became a Horror Sensation

P.T.
Survival Horror
Systems
5.5 /10
Released
August 12, 2014
ESRB
m

Developer(s)
Kojima Productions
Publisher(s)
Konami
Platform(s)
PS4
Powered by

Only Kojima can make a playable teaser for a never-to-be-released Silent Hill game and turn it into one of the biggest revolutions in gaming. Even if his relationship with Konami imploded not long after, that should take nothing away from the sheer impact P.T. had on the gaming industry.

The looping hallway was so revolutionary that it spawned the anomaly hunting genre, while the game's obtuse puzzles formed communities to crowdsourced solutions. If this game wasn't legendary enough on its own merits, the fact that it's pretty much no longer playable cemented its legend. After Kojima and Konami parted ways, Konami delisted the demo from the PlayStation Store, turning it into a piece of lost media so valuable that PS4s with P.T. downloaded on them have sold for thousands of dollars!
